channel.title: Comments on: A New Version, A New Theme

item.title: By: Standard Warfare
item.dc:creator: Standard Warfare
item.description: Maybe it's time you had another remodel. I think your blog could really do with some images, at the moment it's very textish.
item.content:encoded: Maybe it’s time you had another remodel. I think your blog could really do with some images, at the moment it’s very textish.

item.title: By: Joseph Scott’s Blog » Blog Archive » Why Do We Still Bother With Nofollow?
item.dc:creator: Joseph Scott’s Blog » Blog Archive » Why Do We Still Bother With Nofollow?
item.description: [...] Ack! I forgot to rip out the nofollow code when I updated to WordPress 2.0. I’ve gone through and removed all of the nofollow code now. Can we please just admit that nofollow does nothing to prevent, stop, slow down, minimize, catch or deter spam? I’d really appreciate it if it was turned off in WordPress by default, especially now that Akismet is included with WordPress. [...]
item.content:encoded: […] Ack! I forgot to rip out the nofollow code when I updated to WordPress 2.0. I’ve gone through and removed all of the nofollow code now. Can we please just admit that nofollow does nothing to prevent, stop, slow down, minimize, catch or deter spam? I’d really appreciate it if it was turned off in WordPress by default, especially now that Akismet is included with WordPress. […]

item.title: By: joseph
item.dc:creator: joseph
item.description: I disabled wp-gatekeeper to push on Akismet even harder :-)
item.content:encoded: I disabled wp-gatekeeper to push on Akismet even harder ðŸ™‚

item.title: By: Jim
item.dc:creator: Jim
item.description:
Ah, a full-width theme! Although I have to say this looks a bit cluttered when compared to your hand-rolled theme. All in all, I think I like this new theme a bit better.
Hmm, looks like wp-gatekeeper isn't WP2.0-ready, eh? Let us know how the spam battle goes.
item.content:encoded:
Ah, a full-width theme! Although I have to say this looks a bit cluttered when compared to your hand-rolled theme. All in all, I think I like this new theme a bit better.

Hmm, looks like wp-gatekeeper isn’t WP2.0-ready, eh? Let us know how the spam battle goes.
